Title: OnlyFans pays creators $25b, posts $11m profit per employee
Summary: Content subscription platform, OnlyFans, has paid more than $25 billion to creators worldwide since its establishment in 2016 . Most of its subscribers are based in the United States, where user spending and user spending is high .

Title: Gov Yusuf tasks NBC to strengthen regulation on digital broadcast
Summary: Kano State Governor, Abba Kabir Yusuf, has advocated for stronger regulatory oversight by the National Broadcasting Commission (NBC) Gov Yusuf tasks NBC to strengthen regulation on digital broadcast .

Title: ASUU suspends two-week strike
Summary: Academic Staff Union of Universities (ASUU) has suspended its two-week warning strike . ASUU President, Prof. Christopher Piwuna, stated this in a press conference in Abuja on Wednesday . Details soon…

Title: French Embassy, group train Bauchi girls on digital skills to combat GBV
Summary: French Embassy, group train Bauchi girls on digital skills to combat GBV . Two hundred girls and young women, including 10 girls living with disabilities, are nearing the completion of a six-month intensive skills acquisition programme . The programme is aimed at empowering women financially and combating gender-based violence (GBV)

Title: No one can cause quarrel between Kwankwaso and me – Gov Yusuf
Summary: Yusuf pledged to remain steadfast in promoting the vision and principles of the Kwankwasiyya movement across the state . He said no one can cause quarrel between the two sides .

Title: Vandalism: Edo govt to regulate operations of scavengers, scrap dealers
Summary: Edo govt to regulate operations of scavengers, scrap dealers . “The way they go about stealing iron rods and removing and destroying property belonging to the people is not acceptable at all. “It is not unacceptable at all,” the minister said .

Title: King Charles to be first to pray with pope in five centuries
Summary: Charles and Leo will pray together in the first such public religious moment since Henry VIII broke away from the Catholic Church . Charles will be first to pray with the pope in five centuries .
